p:
The PacBio Sequel long reads and Illumina short reads were combined to perform a de novo assembly of the A. trifoliata genome. Canu (v1.4) was first used to assemble the genome with the corrected-error-rate parameter
48 . Then, the corrected reads were independently assembled with WTDBG (v1.2.3)
49 . The well-assembled Canu and WTDBG results were merged by Quickmerge
50 . The merged genome was corrected with the Illumina data using Pilon
51 .
